document.full_text: libyan television on thursday broadcast footage of muammar gaddafi driving around tripoli in an open-top sports utility vehicle and said the outing occurred while the libyan capital was being bombed by nato.
document.title: libyan tv shows gaddafi driving around tripoli
lines_and_colors: libyan television on thursday broadcast footage of muammar gaddafi driving around tripoli in an open-top sports utility vehicle and said the outing occurred while the libyan capital was being bombed by nato.
